job.title: Software Documentation Engineer
job.description: Position: Software Documentation Engineer  Will be responsible for all commercial and project needs for Telkom Tribe Travel Tourism (wonderin.id & travelaja.id)  Qualification:  - Min 1 years experience in same or related position - Experienced in creating software documentation and diagram such as Usecase, UML, Flowchart, Activity Diagram, user guide, system documentation, testing documentation, etc. - Good Knowledge of Database, ERD, DFD, or other Data model - Familiar with Confluence/JIRA, Database, API, and Agile Methodology such as Scrum or Kanban is a huge advantage  Job Description:  - Create, update, and maintain all documentation each of software / product life cycle. - write script, diagrams, and so forth for helping others to understand a system work - Within a cross-functional team, collaborate with other developers, software architect, quality assurance, UI designer, UX researcher, product owner, and scrum master. - Scripting for API Documentation and Mockup. - Learn multiple tools for the job. - Create data model, diagram, workflow, and so forth to assist technical team.
